name: Updatescanner
tagline: Firefox addon to monitor web pages for updates. Useful for websites that don't provide Atom or RSS feeds.
body:
### Quick Start
1. Install the [Update Scanner Firefox addon](https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/update-scanner/).
1. Right-click on any page, and select _"Scan Page for Updates"_.
1. You can choose how often the site will be checked for changes, and whether to ignore minor updates.
1. When a change is detected, a notification window is displayed. Click the blue up-arrow on the bottom status bar to show the Update Scanner sidebar. Webpages that have been updated are shown in bold.
1. Click any item to display the latest changes to the website. Each change is highlighted in yellow.
